name: (WIP) VR Training House
description: A VR experience used to train officers within the Lancashire Constabulary on how to interact with digital devices. Focusing on the usability and accessibility of gameplay and a maintainable codebase.

name: (WIP) Unreal Brawler Project
description: A third-person brawler game set in a Norse inspired futuristic world. Created in collaboration with a small team in Unreal Engine 4, with my focus being to develop the AI, animation, and UI systems.

name: 3D Object Manipulation in AR (BSc Project)
description: This forms the basis for my BSc dissertation and subsequent (submitted) research paper. It includes a unique and novel interaction technique for 3D object manipulation in AR on mobile devices.

name: Unreal Engine 4 & C++ Course
